content.question: What is Mr. Haradaâ€™s perspective on manga?

choices.label: He wants it to be assigned for homework.
He believes it should not be in the school library.
He thinks it has no educational value.
He considers it a bad influence on children.

content.answer: He believes it should not be in the school library.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
